data.title: Buena Vista Union School District
data.meta_description: Extended Learning - Panama-Buena Vista Union School District
data.text:
The Instructional Resource Services is the place to go if you need to complete a project from beginning to end! It was originally designed to meet the needs of Panama-Buena Vista Union School District staff but it is now open to the public. The Lab is a revolving door for teachers, aides, and classroom volunteers who come to complete projects for classrooms. However, since we are now open to the public, we have visitors from churches, scout groups, daycares, etc., who utilize our lab also.

The lab offers a wide variety of curriculum tools such as:

Laminating machines (various widths)

Lamination materials (various qualities/thicknesses)

Art Supplies

Poster Machine

Copier

Paper Supplies

VariQuest Die Cutting Machine

Book Binding Machine

Curriculum Files/Books

Idea Books, Magazines, & Clip Art Catalogs

Ready to go Posters for the classroom
